verbose_text: Hsp104 N566I also reduced the proportion of cells with multiple FUS foci but was not as effective as Hsp104 A503V or potentiated NBD1 variants at eliminating cytoplasmic FUS foci (XREF_FIG, XREF_FIG, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: Hsp104 N566I  also reduced the proportion of cells with multiple FUS foci but was not as effective as Hsp104 A503V  or potentiated NBD1 variants
